other_tests.findings: Erythrophagocytosis was evident; macrophages with intracellular erythrocytes were noted.
Fulminant hepatitis suggestive of a viral process with no overt hepatocyte necrosis.
Negative for hepatitis A, B, and C viruses; weakly positive for West Nile virus serology.
Negative for West Nile virus nucleic acid and positive for flavivirus.
